entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as having a worst memory. The text does not provide further information about this memory.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is introduced as the new Headmistress of Hogwarts. She has asked the Minister to sign an order for the expulsion of Peeves.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is mentioned as a ghost who is being expelled by Umbridge.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as someone who has been won over by Umbridge. He has knowledge of the school's secret passages and hiding places.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as a student who is visiting Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: weasley twins
entities.description: The Weasley twins are mentioned as having knowledge of the school's secret passages and hiding places.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: Harry's Firebolt is mentioned as being in Umbridge's office.

entities.name: fred and george weasley
entities.description: Fred and George Weasley are mentioned as having a Clean Sweep.

relationships.description: Umbridge has asked the Minister to sign an order for the expulsion of Peeves.
Filch has been won over by Umbridge and will probably prove an important weapon in her plans.
Harry Potter is visiting Professor Umbridge.
The Weasley twins have knowledge of the school's secret passages and hiding places, just like Filch.
